00001 /*
00002  * Grid2P.h
00003  * ------
00004  * Ugly hard-coded temporary program to generate a Cartesian grid.
00005  * 1) Read in grid information: nx, ny, nz, depth, dx dy, dz, kx, ky, kz, poro
00006  * 2) Calculate transmissibility and build connection list
00007  */
00008
